alerts.message: Despite an approved pre-authorization for ₹500,000 and sufficient annual limits, the insurance has covered ₹0.00 of the ₹400,000 hospital bill. This contradicts the expected cashless coverage based on the approved pre-authorization, leaving a significant patient balance of ₹350,000.
alerts.suggested_action: Immediately contact Red Insurance to investigate why the approved pre-authorization amount has not been applied to the bill. Clarify the reason for ₹0.00 coverage and the patient's balance. Verify if any deductibles, co-pays, non-covered services, or processing errors account for this discrepancy. Patient discharge cannot proceed from an insurance perspective until this is resolved.
evidence: Pre-authorization (PA-2024-00231) approved for ₹500,000. Total Hospital Bill: ₹400,000. Amount Covered by Insurance: ₹0.00. Patient's Balance: ₹350,000. Coverage Type: Cashless.
